nodes.text: Naescorcom was a company that manufactured macrobinoculars. The Jedi Padawan Ezra Bridger owened a pair of custom macrobinoculars created from scrap parts made by Naescorcom and the manufacturers VidGraph and Neuro-Saav.

Naescorcom was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2015 reference book Star Wars Rebels: Visual Guide: Epic Battles written by Adam Bray. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, the company was first mentioned in the 2001 Wizards of the Coast roleplaying game source book Living Force Campaign Guide by Robert Wiese and Andy Collins.
